properties.name: simulation.executor.core.pool.size
properties.description: Pool size (number of threads available) for submitting simulation run jobs

properties.name: simulation.executor.queue.capacity
properties.description: Maximum capacity for the thread executor when submitting simulation run jobs

properties.name: storage.executor.core.pool.size
properties.description: Pool size (number of threads available) for storing model data during a run

properties.name: storage.executor.queue.capacity
properties.description: Maximum capacity for the thread executor when storing model data during a run
